Summary: Biochemical reaction from ifosfamide to 3-dechloroethyl ifosfamide, chloroacetaldehyde.
Biochemical reaction from ifosfamide to 2-dechloroethyl ifosfamide, chloroacetaldehyde. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP3A4, CYP3A5 or CYP2B6.
Biochemical reaction from aldoifosfamide to carboxyifosfamide. This interaction is catalyzed by ALDH1A1.

Controller: CYP2A6, CYP2B6, CYP2C8, CYP2C9, CYP3A4, CYP3A5
Summary: Biochemical reaction from ifosfamide to 4-hydroxyifosfamide. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP2C9, CYP2A6, CYP2B6, CYP3A5, CYP2C8 or CYP3A4.
Biochemical reaction from aldoifosfamide to acrolein, isophosphoramide mustard.
